summary: The 'Halt All Lethal Trafficking of Fentanyl Act' (HALT Fentanyl Act) aims to amend the Controlled Substances Act to address fentanyl-related substances. It places these substances in Schedule I, defines them based on their chemical structure, and establishes registration requirements for researchers. The bill also streamlines research procedures, clarifies manufacturing activities related to research, and increases penalties related to fentanyl-related substances. The bill requires the Attorney General to issue relevant rules and makes technical corrections to existing law.
